F.A.Q.

Can I interview you for ____________?

If you are looking for a formal interview about a project, consultation, speaking engagement or career opportunity, please use the contact form.

I represent a recruitment agency, will you work with me?

I'm an independent contractor and not searching for agency representation. Please understand that I have limited availability and third parties are (usually) lengthy, uncertain affairs without exclusivity over the commission and hiring process.

Where do you operate out of?

California and Hawaii in the United States. Relocation is not an option at this time.
